page.title: 14A DAY OF A CARMARTHEN GIRL
page.content: and Welsh are the lessons we have. At 3.40.p.m,school finishes.I usually walk home with Leighton Keenan who is a boy in my class. When I arrive home I have tea.I usually have chips or something else. Then I go down Melanie's house.I watch videos.A video is a tape which you put into a machine which tapes programmes off the television.I usually go home at 9.00 p.m. On Mondays I watch a programme called 'The Young Ones'.This is a comedy programme and I think it is the best on T.V. After that has finished I go to sleep or read a book.Sometimes I read 'Smash Hits'.Smash Hits is a good magazine and it features some words of songs in the charts.I also read other books by Enid Blyton.
